Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do wait() end end
waitForChild(vCharacter, "Torso") waitForChild(vCharacter, "Humanoid")
local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {}
local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local zombieLeftArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438670) local zombieLeftLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438718) local zombieRightArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438626) local zombieRightLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438742) local zombieTorso = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438589) local zombieHat = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64438501)
if zombieLeftArm then zombieLeftArm = zombieLeftArm:GetChildren()[1] end if zombieRightArm then zombieRightArm = zombieRightArm:GetChildren()[1] end if zombieLeftLeg then zombieLeftLeg = zombieLeftLeg:GetChildren()[1] end if zombieRightLeg then zombieRightLeg = zombieRightLeg:GetChildren()[1] end if zombieTorso then zombieTorso = zombieTorso:GetChildren()[1] end if zombieHat then zombieHat = zombieHat:GetChildren()[1] end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 9.0
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() local duration = 10 if myHumanoid then while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(2.5) duration = duration - wait(1) wait(1) end end end))
charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then local clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" then local clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then local clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end end
local graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then -- nothing end end end end
zombieLeftArm.Parent = vCharacter zombieRightArm.Parent = vCharacter zombieLeftLeg.Parent = vCharacter zombieRightLeg.Parent = vCharacter zombieTorso.Parent = vCharacter zombieHat.Parent = vCharacter
wait(10.0)
if insertTable ~= nil then local graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then local headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do -- nothing end end end for i =1, #insertTable do local clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end for i =1, #headTable do if headTable[i].Name == "Mesh" then local clone = headTable[i]:Clone() --clone.Parent = vCharacter.Head end end end
wait(5.0) script:Remove()

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local staffDamage = 25
local ball = Instance.new("Part") ball.FormFactor = 3 ball.Shape = "Block" ball.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) ball.CanCollide = false ball.Transparency = 0.0
local bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" bullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" bullet.Parent = ball bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local ballFire = Instance.new("Fire") ballFire.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) ballFire.Parent = ball ballFire.Size = 2.0 ballFire.Heat = 2.0
local snarlSound
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function pierce(missile, hit) local humanoid if missile then if hit.Parent and hit then if hit.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(staffDamage) if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("ZombifyScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.ZombifyScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function shoot(direction) vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = Staff.Position + direction * 4.0
local missile = ball:Clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) missile.Velocity = direction * 90.0 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(missile, 5) end
function staffUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function staffDown() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0.848, 0.53) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -0.53, 0.848) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Staff.Position).unit staffDown() shoot(direction)
wait(0.9) staffUp()
snarlSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("SnarlSound") if snarlSound then snarlSound:Play() end
wait(3.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() if snarlSound then snarlSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
